summary: THE PASSENGER SIDE 'A' PILLAR PLASTIC COVER FLEW OFF AT HIGHWAY SPEED.  CARS BEHIND ME SWERVED AND COULD HAVE CAUSED A CATASTROPHIC ACCIDENT.   THE RUBBER GASKET WAS DANGLING AND CONSEQUENTLY BLOCKING THE PASSENGER REAR VIEW SIDE MIRROR.  FORD IS STATING THAT IT 'IS NOT A FACTORY DEFECT' AND CONSEQUENTLY I SHOULD PAY FOR THE REPLACEMENT (EVEN THOUGH I BOUGHT THE CAR NEW, AND ALSO PURCHASED THEIR 'PREMIUM CARE WARRANTY.)  THE CAR HAS 40K MILES ON IT.
